issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue is undergoing QA.  See linked QA issue(s) for progress.
status.name: In QA

fields.description:
Around half the database transactions on an idle cloud are associated with static property refresh. The stack traces for property database access are:

{code}
com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$TxRecord.<init>(Entities.java:1489)	
com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$CascadingTx.<init>(Entities.java:1187)	
com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities.createTransaction(Entities.java:239)	
com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities.get(Entities.java:266)	
com.eucalyptus.configurable.StaticDatabasePropertyEntry.lookup(StaticDatabasePropertyEntry.java:143)	
com.eucalyptus.configurable.StaticPropertyEntry.getValue(StaticPropertyEntry.java:102)	
com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$StaticPropertiesAdd.get(ServiceTransitions.java:896)	
com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$StaticPropertiesAdd.get(ServiceTransitions.java:885)	
com.google.common.base.Suppliers$ExpiringMemoizingSupplier.get(Suppliers.java:199)	
com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$StateCallbacks$3.fire(ServiceTransitions.java:843)	
com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$StateCallbacks$3.fire(ServiceTransitions.java:839)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Transitions$1.leave(Transitions.java:94)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.TransitionImpl$2.apply(TransitionImpl.java:222)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.TransitionImpl$2.apply(TransitionImpl.java:219)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.TransitionImpl.fireListeners(TransitionImpl.java:176)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.TransitionImpl.leave(TransitionImpl.java:219)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState$ActiveTransition.leave(AtomicMarkedState.java:524)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState.afterLeave(AtomicMarkedState.java:342)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState.transition(AtomicMarkedState.java:185)	
com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceState.transition(ServiceState.java:136)	
com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceState.transition(ServiceState.java:83)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Automata$1.call(Automata.java:141)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Automata$1.call(Automata.java:126)	
com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions.executeTransition(ServiceTransitions.java:317)	
com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions.pathTo(ServiceTransitions.java:183)	
com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$TopologyChange.doTopologyChange(Topology.java:1345)	
com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$TopologyChange.apply(Topology.java:1336)	
com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$Transitions.apply(Topology.java:1308)	
com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$Transitions$2.apply(Topology.java:1248)	
com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$Transitions$2.apply(Topology.java:1234)	
com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$8.call(Topology.java:1187)	
com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$8.call(Topology.java:1175)
{code}

{code}
com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$TxRecord.<init>(Entities.java:1489)	
com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$CascadingTx.<init>(Entities.java:1187)	
com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities.createTransaction(Entities.java:239)	
com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities.get(Entities.java:266)	
com.eucalyptus.configurable.StaticDatabasePropertyEntry.lookup(StaticDatabasePropertyEntry.java:143)	
com.eucalyptus.configurable.StaticPropertyEntry.getValue(StaticPropertyEntry.java:102)	
com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$StaticPropertiesAdd.get(ServiceTransitions.java:896)	
com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$StaticPropertiesAdd.get(ServiceTransitions.java:885)	
com.google.common.base.Suppliers$ExpiringMemoizingSupplier.get(Suppliers.java:199)	
com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$StateCallbacks$3.fire(ServiceTransitions.java:843)	
com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$StateCallbacks$3.fire(ServiceTransitions.java:839)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Transitions$1.leave(Transitions.java:94)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.TransitionImpl$2.apply(TransitionImpl.java:222)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.TransitionImpl$2.apply(TransitionImpl.java:219)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.TransitionImpl.fireListeners(TransitionImpl.java:176)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.TransitionImpl.leave(TransitionImpl.java:219)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState$ActiveTransition.leave(AtomicMarkedState.java:524)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState.afterLeave(AtomicMarkedState.java:342)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState.transition(AtomicMarkedState.java:185)	
com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceState.transition(ServiceState.java:136)	
com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceState.transition(ServiceState.java:83)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Automata$1.call(Automata.java:141)	
com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Automata$1.call(Automata.java:126)	
com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions.executeTransition(ServiceTransitions.java:317)	
com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions.pathTo(ServiceTransitions.java:183)	
com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$TopologyChange.doTopologyChange(Topology.java:1345)	
com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$TopologyChange.apply(Topology.java:1336)	
com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$Transitions.apply(Topology.java:1308)	
com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$Transitions$3.apply(Topology.java:1286)	
com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$Transitions$3.apply(Topology.java:1277)	
com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$8.call(Topology.java:1187)	
com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$8.call(Topology.java:1175)
{code}

We should use a single transaction to check for any updated static properties rather than one transaction per property.
fields.summary: Static properties reloading uses too many transactions

comments.body: To verify check for any regressions in handling configuration variable (cloud property) changes.
